Text: Well, this DVD banks on Katt Williams... but it's 20 minutes of his old material, presented much better in "The Pimp Chronicles" release. Katt even mentions "It's 2004" and Sam Tripoli's cracking Kobe Bryant jokes to put a date on things. It would have been much better to try and get this released earlier, but now it's just a cash-in attempt. The best part of this DVD was Aries Spears, he was amazing if you'd never seen him outside of Mad TV.
